sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RHEINBACH a town of the Prussian government of Cologne, the capital of a circle of the same name, which extends over seventy square miles, and contains 23,500 inhabitants. The tow r n is situated on the river Erft, is ill built, with 250 houses, and 1500 inhabitants.
